topic.title: My wife fucked me over
topic.body: Hi, I'd like to know, what would You do in a situation described below: My wife fucked me over really bad. She wants to destroy me. Should I allow her? (kids loose their father, god knows what happens to mother). Should I "solve" the problem? (kids loose their mother and their father - I won't be able to live knowing what happened), what should I do? WHAT THE FUCK should I do?! I'm trying to convince her, to stop this, but she is so stubborn, I still love her, but I don't know what to do. If I want to keep myself alive and not hurt my wife I have to hurt so many people instead :( I'm not like that, I can't give such an order :( What do I do? Help :( WHAT DO I DO?
